text: Akasagalalli mattu bhumiyalliruva ellavannu allahanu nimage adhinagolisiruvudannu mattu avanu vyakta hagu avyaktavada tanna anugrahagalannu nimage dharalavagi nidiruvudannu nivu noduttillave? Adaru janaralli kelavaru jnanavagali, margadarsanavagali, ujvala granthavagali yavudu illadeye allahana visayadalli jagaladuttare
